news.title: Live Report: Wet Leg shake up Dublin's 3Olympia
news.summary: The Isle of Wight quintet blew their fans away with a loud, powerful performance.

news.title: Sally Rooney says Palestine Action ban may block UK publication
news.summary: “If Palestine Action is still proscribed by the time my next book is due for publication, then it will be unavailable to readers in the United Kingdom,” said Rooney.

news.title: Ac3 releases debut EP All Hands On Deck
news.summary: Listen to the new EP below.

news.title: Jason Isbell and The 400 Unit announce Belfast and Dublin shows
news.summary: Jason Isbell most recently played in Ireland this past February with a solo show at Vicar Street.

news.title: Album Review: Back To Winnipeg, Apartment Living
Live Report: Bob Vylan welcomed with open arms at raucous and politically-charged Dublin gig
news.summary: Despite attempts from some local politicians to call the gig off, UK punk-rap duo Bob Vylan were on form for a receptive Vicar Street audience on Wednesday evening.

news.title: Pause launches Amy Winehouse 'You Know I'm No Good' Collection
news.summary: Each art print comes with a certificate of authenticity, with a portion of the proceeds going to the Amy Winehouse Foundation.

news.title: Scustin announce HotGirl, Puck, Smithereens and more as support for Ireland tour
In the new Christmas issue: Saipan star Éanna Hardwicke graces the cover of Hot Press
news.summary: Featuring: Saipan star Éanna Hardwicke, Huartan, Jamie-Lee O’Donnell, Imelda May, Miriam O’Callaghan, Ben Elton, Ash, Janet Devlin, The Altered Hours, Iona Zajac and more... Plus: the star-studded Hot Press Christmas Summit, with BIIRD, KNEECAP manager/Bohs COO Daniel Lambert, Cliffords, Junior Brother, Shark School, Steve Wall and DUG.
